item.title: Youtube Short Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a professional (Mobile Game) Youtube Short Editor:
- 24 to 30 shorts per month
- Medium special effects to keep the audience intrigued for that 1 minute
- Short to medium production time per short (1-2 hours after mastering the styles)

Skills:
- background removal of face-cam
- Add special effects / sound effects to increase entertainment value
- Ability to produce different styles of content

The shorts will derive from already created video content. There will be an option to receive raw future footage if that helps with your editing process.

Shorts need to be captioned and have an entertaining editing vibe.   

This could lead into bigger future editing contracts with my other businesses.  (Part Time & Full Time)(Q4)
Thank you for your interest!
- Trinity


Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
